name: Pouncy Paws
description:
Get ready to pounce! Pouncy Paws Sanctuary is open and ready to rescue animals from captivity!

- Prowl the wilds in search of animals in need! With over 80+ animals to rescue!
- Grow your animals from baby cubs to powerful lions!
- Expand your sanctuary, collect care coins and explore the vast Savannah's, luscious jungles and cool arctic peaks.

PLEASE NOTE:

Pouncy Paws is completely free to play. However, some items can be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your devices settings.

Pouncy Paws was developed by PlaySide, the developers behind Editors' Choice title "Catch The Ark", Drift It, Monkey Ropes, Icy Ropes and more.

Let us know what you would love to see in our next update at : www.playsidestudios.com
